equipment.name: Sovereign Vambraces
base_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills gain <text class='c_random'>44.56%</text> Attack Speed.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +20.25% Chance to Slow

equipment.name: Band
base_affixes: While <text class='c_important'><u>Healthy</u></text>, <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text> grant <text class='c_random'>26.6</text> Essence.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Boots
strikethrough_affixes: Your maximum number of Skeletal Warriors is increased by <text class='c_random'>2</text>.
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Mist</text> triggers <text class='c_important'>Corpse Explosion</text> on surrounding Corpses. When <text class='c_important'>Blood Mist</text> detonates a Corpse, its Cooldown is reduced by <text class='c_random'>0.43</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Jade Relic
strikethrough_affixes: Skills deal up to <text class='c_random'>25.62%</text> increased damage based on your available Primary Resource when cast, receiving the maximum benefit while you have full Primary Resource.
added_affixes: Gain <text class='c_random'>24.32%</text> increased Critical Strike Chance for <text class='c_number'>9</text> seconds when you cast <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>. You deal <text class='c_random'>48.64%</text> bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Helm
base_affixes: Damaging an Elite enemy grants you a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> absorbing up to <text class='c_random'>1.37</text> damage for <text class='c_number'>10</text> seconds. This effect can only happen once every <text class='c_number'>30</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Archon Armor
strikethrough_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>0.99%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>4</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>59.67%</text>.
added_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>1.03%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>4</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>61.8%</text>.

equipment.name: Chain
base_affixes: Whenever your <text class='c_important'>Blood</text> Skills <text class='c_important'><u>Overpower</u></text> you gain <text class='c_random'>61%</text> Attack Speed for <text class='c_number'>5.2</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Boneweave Faulds
base_affixes: Consuming a <text class='c_important'>Corpse</text> has a <text class='c_random'>26.94%</text> chance to spawn a <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orb</u></text>.

equipment.name: Rattling Bones
base_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Wave</text> fires two additional waves, each dealing <text class='c_random'>48.6%</text> less damage than the previous.

equipment.name: Mother's Embrace
base_affixes: If a <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skill hits <text class='c_number'>6</text> or more enemies, <text class='c_random'>49.63%</text> of the Resource cost is refunded.
